PacShore Communities
PacShore Communities boast properties that are lifestyle driven, allowing residents the opportunity to live life to the fullest.
About Our Company
PacShore Communities are more than just a place to live. Our carefully chosen properties are the perfect choice for anyone looking for more than a neighborhood. With tons of amenities, activities and prime destinations, our residents don’t have to look far to find an amazing experience.
PacShore Communities is a leading operator of Manufactured Home Communities, RV Resorts and Campgrounds in North America. With beautiful communities and parks in the most desirable locations, we offer various homes and camping options to meet a wide variety of our customers’ needs.
Contact Us
We're Buying
Communities Nationwide
If you are an owner interested in selling your park, or a broker representing a seller, contact us. Below is our investment criteria.
Sell Your Park
Manufactured Home Communities
50+ Sites
All-Age & Senior Parks
Located In or Near MSA's With 100,000 or More in Population.
RV Resorts & Resorts
100+ Sites
Within 2 hours of Large MSA's
Transient, Seasonal, & Permanent Visitors
Near Tourist Destinations
Our Leadership
Our company is one of the leading providers in high-end real estate. Our services includes wide variety of luxurious properties and we will make sure you get the best experience when dealing with us. We started this company to help people find the home they deserve and we will make it our mission to make sure that your lifestyle is exclusive and high-end experience.
Contact Us
Amit Israni
Managing Principal
Sara McFarland
VP Operations
Ryan Yanulevich
Acquisitions Manager
Brandy Green
National Property Operations
Trevin Alvarez
Accounting Manager
Aidan McCay
Marketing Manager
